name: uri-js
description: An RFC 3986/3987 compliant, scheme extendable URI/IRI parsing/normalizing/resolving/serializing library for JavaScript.

scripts.build:es5: rollup -c && cp dist/esnext/uri.d.ts dist/es5/uri.all.d.ts && npm run build:es5:fix-sourcemap
scripts.build:es5:min: uglifyjs dist/es5/uri.all.js --output dist/es5/uri.all.min.js --source-map "content='dist/es5/uri.all.js.map',filename='uri.all.min.js.map'" --comments --mangle --compress "pure_funcs=['merge', 'subexp']" && cp dist/es5/uri.all.d.ts dist/es5/uri.all.min.d.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:esnext && npm run build:es5 && npm run build:es5:min

author: Gary Court <gary.court@gmail.com>
